item.title: Leff house garages and Athelstan bin shed, 13th August
item.description:
The lights in the Leff house car park garages and also Athelstan gardens bin sheds have been not working since before the 26th June, dispute a previous report they have not been fixed and during that time we have had increased anti social behaviour in these garages including a drug driver smashing into a car in the garage, when will this be fixed?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Winchester Avenue, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing commercial skip with domestic waste, 13th August
item.description:
This is a two-fold ongoing issue which has still not been resolved. 1) Tenants of these flats need to be provided waste disposal facilities. Unless this happens they will continue to use the commercial skip for their domestic waste. 2) The skip is overflowing with domestic waste & needs removing immediately. Rubbish bags are continually falling off / being pulled off by animals/birds & being spread around the streets on a daily basis. It is shameful to allow this situation to continue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 128-136, Beckenham Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Various rubbish dumped all along Evergreen Close, 13th August
item.description:
Could we please have the dumped rubbish removed from the close. There is a huge tree trunk dumped here along the grass verge, as well as general litter left by people sitting in cars along the verge. And on the other side along the paths there are various bin bags of rubbish. Thanks in advance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evergreen Close, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking notice is not visible at all at the junction between Yarnton Way and Willow school, 13th August
item.description:
The lack of sign has meant that motorists can park without expecting to be issued a parking penalty which was issued on 23rd August 2025. Under no circumstance would I park at a prohibited place knowing the consequences. Because I was out town the next day, I paid instantly. Please do investigate and revert to me. Be advised that I had gone into Lakeview Health Centre for a blood test!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Yarnton Way, London
Report on FixMyStreet
